title: Calm Emotions
content:
Calm Emotions Level 2 Enchantment Spell Humanoids can't be Charmed, Frightened, or become enraged. 10 turns 18m Concentration Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Enchantment Spell

Humanoids can't be Charmed, Frightened, or become enraged.

18m Concentration

Calm Emotions is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Calm Emotions is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
